src:
女子７８キロ級、梅木が２年連続３度目Ｖ…柔道講道館杯

02 Nov 2019, 10:44

　柔道・講道館杯全日本体重別選手権第１日（２日・千葉ポートアリーナ＝読売新聞社など後援）――来年の東京五輪代表１次選考会を兼ねて行われ、女子７８キロ級は２０１６年リオデジャネイロ五輪代表の梅木真美（ＡＬＳＯＫ）が２年連続３度目の優勝。７０キロ級は田中志歩（環太平洋大）が連覇を果たした。男子７３キロ級は原田健士（日体大）が決勝で海老沼匡（パーク２４）を破って初優勝した。
text:
Women's 78kg class, Umeki is the third V for the second consecutive year ... Judo Kodokan Cup

02 Nov 2019, 10:44

Judo / Kodokan Cup All Japan Weight Championship 1st Day (2nd, sponsored by Chiba Port Arena = Yomiuri Shimbun)-also held next year's Tokyo Olympics national team 1st selection meeting, women's 78km class Rio de Janeiro in 2016 Olympic representative Mami Umeki (ALSOK) won the championship for the second consecutive year for the third time. Shiho Tanaka (Pacific Pacific University) won the 70km class. In the men's 73-kilometer class, Kenji Harada (Nichitai Univ.) Defeated Ebinuma Kei (Park 24) for the first time in the final.
